skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in building responsive and user-friendly interfaces using modern front-end technologies. My expertise lies in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: With a solid foundation in server-side technologies, I develop scalable and secure back-end systems using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I focus on creating efficient APIs, handling complex database operations, and ensuring seamless integration between the front and back end.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I have a keen eye for user-centric design, focusing on creating intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interfaces. My approach to UI/UX design is rooted in empathy, understanding the users' needs, and delivering designs that enhance the overall experience.

skills.title: Figma
skills.description: As a Figma enthusiast, I utilize its collaborative design tools to craft interactive prototypes and user flows. Figma allows me to efficiently translate ideas into visual solutions while ensuring consistency in design systems.

portfolio.title: Buy-IT
portfolio.description: A full fledge Ecom website for a Clothing brand, it uses stripe as a secure payment and gateway and firebase authentication

portfolio.title: Link Magnet
portfolio.description: A website tailored for small business owners and content creators, allowing them track their users

portfolio.title: myPatient
portfolio.description: A patient management application that  allows patients to easily register, book, and manage their appointments with doctors
